projects.name: Cerina protocol foundary
projects.description: a production-grade multi-agent CBT system for Clinical Purpose using a technical stack of Python, LangGraph, FastAPI, MCP and React. Implemented a Supervisor-Worker orchestration with a typed blackboard state for collaborative reasoning, featuring autonomous routing and human-in-the-loop safety approvals. The system is containerized with Docker on AWS EC2 and integrated with a Vercel frontend through real-time SSE streaming for live workflow monitoring.

projects.description: engineered and built a four-node LangGraph RAG Agent using Python, ChromaDB, and Groq to create a high-performance, retrieval-aware QA system. The architecture utilizes semantic vector search with optimized chunking and conditional execution logic to ensure high-precision results while minimizing retrieval latency. Integrated RAGAs and an LLM-as-a-Judge framework to rigorously evaluate the system's faithfulness and relevance for production-level reliability.

projects.name: Smart Medical Chatbot with Vision and Voice
projects.description: developed a multimodal Smart Medical Chatbot using Meta Llama3 Vision 90B and GROQ to enable high-speed diagnostic image and text understanding. Integrated OpenAI Whisper and ElevenLabs to provide a seamless voice-to-voice interface, allowing users to interact naturally through speech. The system features a Gradio UI for medical image analysis and is deployed on Hugging Face Spaces for globally accessible, scalable inference.
